replies.body:
It's ok to say it if it's in proper context, such as: 'An Avicus IP is skywars.co'

But don't troll and use it in something like: 'GO TO SKYWARS.CO BEST SERVER EVER' as that will confuse some staff and you may even end up with a ban.
replies.body_tagged:
